alert.note: Alert for Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 4:53PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Limestone County through 545 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Harvest to near Athens to 6 miles east of Rogersville. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Athens, Ardmore, Elkmont, Lester, Good Springs, Cartwright, Coxey, Cairo, Holland Gin and Mt Rozell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
